22 template <typename VoxelType>
23 class Layer {
24  public:
25  EIGEN_MAKE_ALIGNED_OPERATOR_NEW
26 
27  typedef std::shared_ptr<Layer> Ptr;
28  typedef Block<VoxelType> BlockType;
29  typedef
30  typename AnyIndexHashMapType<typename BlockType::Ptr>::type BlockHashMap;
31  typedef typename std::pair<BlockIndex, typename BlockType::Ptr> BlockMapPair;
32 
33  explicit Layer(FloatingPoint voxel_size, size_t voxels_per_side)
34  : voxel_size_(voxel_size), voxels_per_side_(voxels_per_side) {
35  CHECK_GT(voxel_size_, 0.0f);
36  voxel_size_inv_ = 1.0 / voxel_size_;
37 
38  block_size_ = voxel_size_ * voxels_per_side_;
39  CHECK_GT(block_size_, 0.0f);
40  block_size_inv_ = 1.0 / block_size_;
41  CHECK_GT(voxels_per_side_, 0u);
42  voxels_per_side_inv_ = 1.0f / static_cast<FloatingPoint>(voxels_per_side_);
43  }
44 
46  explicit Layer(const LayerProto& proto);
47 
49  explicit Layer(const Layer& other);
50 
51  virtual ~Layer() {}
52 
53  enum class BlockMergingStrategy { kProhibit, kReplace, kDiscard, kMerge };
54 
55  inline const BlockType& getBlockByIndex(const BlockIndex& index) const {
56  typename BlockHashMap::const_iterator it = block_map_.find(index);
57  if (it == block_map_.end()) {
58  LOG(FATAL) << "Accessed unallocated block at " << index.transpose();
59  }
60  return *(it->second);
61  }
62 
63  inline BlockType& getBlockByIndex(const BlockIndex& index) {
64  typename BlockHashMap::iterator it = block_map_.find(index);
65  if (it == block_map_.end()) {
66  LOG(FATAL) << "Accessed unallocated block at " << index.transpose();
67  }
68  return *(it->second);
69  }
70 
71  inline typename BlockType::ConstPtr getBlockPtrByIndex(
72  const BlockIndex& index) const {
73  typename BlockHashMap::const_iterator it = block_map_.find(index);
74  if (it != block_map_.end()) {
75  return it->second;
76  } else {
77  return typename BlockType::ConstPtr();
78  }
79  }
80 
81  inline typename BlockType::Ptr getBlockPtrByIndex(const BlockIndex& index) {
82  typename BlockHashMap::iterator it = block_map_.find(index);
83  if (it != block_map_.end()) {
84  return it->second;
85  } else {
86  return typename BlockType::Ptr();
87  }
88  }
89 
94  inline typename BlockType::Ptr allocateBlockPtrByIndex(
95  const BlockIndex& index) {
96  typename BlockHashMap::iterator it = block_map_.find(index);
97  if (it != block_map_.end()) {
98  return it->second;
99  } else {
100  return allocateNewBlock(index);
101  }
102  }
103 
104  inline typename BlockType::ConstPtr getBlockPtrByCoordinates(
105  const Point& coords) const {
106  return getBlockPtrByIndex(computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(coords));
107  }
108 
109  inline typename BlockType::Ptr getBlockPtrByCoordinates(const Point& coords) {
110  return getBlockPtrByIndex(computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(coords));
111  }
112 
117  inline typename BlockType::Ptr allocateBlockPtrByCoordinates(
118  const Point& coords) {
119  return allocateBlockPtrByIndex(computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(coords));
120  }
121 
127  inline BlockIndex computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(
128  const Point& coords) const {
129  return getGridIndexFromPoint<BlockIndex>(coords, block_size_inv_);
130  }
131 
132  typename BlockType::Ptr allocateNewBlock(const BlockIndex& index) {
133  auto insert_status = block_map_.emplace(
134  index, std::make_shared<BlockType>(
135  voxels_per_side_, voxel_size_,
136  getOriginPointFromGridIndex(index, block_size_)));
137 
138  DCHECK(insert_status.second)
139  << "Block already exists when allocating at " << index.transpose();
140 
141  DCHECK(insert_status.first->second);
142  DCHECK_EQ(insert_status.first->first, index);
143  return insert_status.first->second;
144  }
145 
146  inline typename BlockType::Ptr allocateNewBlockByCoordinates(
147  const Point& coords) {
148  return allocateNewBlock(computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(coords));
149  }
150 
151  inline void insertBlock(
152  const std::pair<const BlockIndex, typename Block<VoxelType>::Ptr>&
153  block_pair) {
154  auto insert_status = block_map_.insert(block_pair);
155 
156  DCHECK(insert_status.second) << "Block already exists when inserting at "
157  << insert_status.first->first.transpose();
158 
159  DCHECK(insert_status.first->second);
160  }
161 
162  void removeBlock(const BlockIndex& index) { block_map_.erase(index); }
163  void removeAllBlocks() { block_map_.clear(); }
164 
165  void removeBlockByCoordinates(const Point& coords) {
166  block_map_.erase(computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(coords));
167  }
168 
169  void removeDistantBlocks(const Point& center, const double max_distance) {
170  AlignedVector<BlockIndex> needs_erasing;
171  for (const std::pair<const BlockIndex, typename BlockType::Ptr>& kv :
172  block_map_) {
173  if ((kv.second->origin() - center).squaredNorm() >
174  max_distance * max_distance) {
175  needs_erasing.push_back(kv.first);
176  }
177  }
178  for (const BlockIndex& index : needs_erasing) {
179  block_map_.erase(index);
180  }
181  }
182 
183  void getAllAllocatedBlocks(BlockIndexList* blocks) const {
184  CHECK_NOTNULL(blocks);
185  blocks->clear();
186  blocks->reserve(block_map_.size());
187  for (const std::pair<const BlockIndex, typename BlockType::Ptr>& kv :
188  block_map_) {
189  blocks->emplace_back(kv.first);
190  }
191  }
192 
193  void getAllUpdatedBlocks(BlockIndexList* blocks) const {
194  CHECK_NOTNULL(blocks);
195  blocks->clear();
196  for (const std::pair<const BlockIndex, typename BlockType::Ptr>& kv :
197  block_map_) {
198  if (kv.second->updated()) {
199  blocks->emplace_back(kv.first);
200  }
201  }
202  }
203 
204  size_t getNumberOfAllocatedBlocks() const { return block_map_.size(); }
205 
206  bool hasBlock(const BlockIndex& block_index) const {
207  return block_map_.count(block_index) > 0;
208  }
209 
214  inline const VoxelType* getVoxelPtrByGlobalIndex(
215  const GlobalIndex& global_voxel_index) const {
216  const BlockIndex block_index = getBlockIndexFromGlobalVoxelIndex(
217  global_voxel_index, voxels_per_side_inv_);
218  if (!hasBlock(block_index)) {
219  return nullptr;
220  }
221  const VoxelIndex local_voxel_index =
222  getLocalFromGlobalVoxelIndex(global_voxel_index, voxels_per_side_);
223  const Block<VoxelType>& block = getBlockByIndex(block_index);
224  return &block.getVoxelByVoxelIndex(local_voxel_index);
225  }
226 
227  inline VoxelType* getVoxelPtrByGlobalIndex(
228  const GlobalIndex& global_voxel_index) {
229  const BlockIndex block_index = getBlockIndexFromGlobalVoxelIndex(
230  global_voxel_index, voxels_per_side_inv_);
231  if (!hasBlock(block_index)) {
232  return nullptr;
233  }
234  const VoxelIndex local_voxel_index =
235  getLocalFromGlobalVoxelIndex(global_voxel_index, voxels_per_side_);
236  Block<VoxelType>& block = getBlockByIndex(block_index);
237  return &block.getVoxelByVoxelIndex(local_voxel_index);
238  }
239 
240  inline const VoxelType* getVoxelPtrByCoordinates(const Point& coords) const {
241  typename Block<VoxelType>::ConstPtr block_ptr =
242  getBlockPtrByIndex(computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(coords));
243  if (!block_ptr) {
244  return nullptr;
245  }
246  return block_ptr->getVoxelPtrByCoordinates(coords);
247  }
248 
249  inline VoxelType* getVoxelPtrByCoordinates(const Point& coords) {
250  typename Block<VoxelType>::Ptr block_ptr =
251  getBlockPtrByIndex(computeBlockIndexFromCoordinates(coords));
252  if (!block_ptr) {
253  return nullptr;
254  }
255  return block_ptr->getVoxelPtrByCoordinates(coords);
256  }
257 
258  FloatingPoint block_size() const { return block_size_; }
259  FloatingPoint block_size_inv() const { return block_size_inv_; }
260  FloatingPoint voxel_size() const { return voxel_size_; }
261  FloatingPoint voxel_size_inv() const { return voxel_size_inv_; }
262  size_t voxels_per_side() const { return voxels_per_side_; }
263  FloatingPoint voxels_per_side_inv() const { return voxels_per_side_inv_; }

268  bool isCompatible(const BlockProto& layer_proto) const;

270  // Default behavior is to clear the file.
271  bool saveSubsetToFile(const std::string& file_path,
272  BlockIndexList blocks_to_include,
273  bool include_all_blocks, bool clear_file = true) const;
274  bool addBlockFromProto(const BlockProto& block_proto,
275  BlockMergingStrategy strategy);

277  size_t getMemorySize() const;
